A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would not recommend this movie to anyone\, especially not a real Star Wars fan.  The plot is unbelievably dumb and disjointed\, the \"humor\" is unbearable and undermines the novelty of the franchise\, and there is just too much random dumb stuff throughout the movie (such as Luke drinking alien titty milk).  Who was Snoke?  I guess it's surprising that he dies\, but I hardly care.  Same for Phasma.  Princess Leia as Mary Poppins/ space witch?  Dumbest thing I've ever seen.  Casino world?? What an utter waste of time.  Rian Johnson has proved himself to be a talentless hack\, this movie made me sick. SAD!
